predicate.note: Frames file for 'complain' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class complain 37.8, no mention of other members. No comparison.

roleset.name: bitch and moan

example.name: complaint as nominal
example.text: Several Big Board firms are organizing *trace* to complain about program trading and the exchange's role in it.
example.arg: program trading and the exchange 's role in it

example.name: complaint as sentence
example.text: Analysts have complained that third-quarter corporate earnings haven't been very good, but the effect hit home particularly hard yesterday.
example.arg: third-quarter corporate earnings have n't been very good

example.name: complain of
example.text: After being kicked in the head, John complained of headaches.
example.arg: After being kicked in the head

roleset.note: This patterns after verbs-of-speaking, so expect split, inverted and fronted constructions. Refer to 'say' for instructions on how to tag those.
